resources.string: ON WHICH DAY IS THE EVENT?

"YEP is a great platform where in users can meet, know and book event planners for their events. The user can either send SMS or call event planner from a list of event planners."


"We are looking for event planners who are 1) Very passionate about event planning 2) Willing to help users in all the ways humanly possible 3) Good organizational and execution skills. 4) Has a strong team and can work independently 5) Excellent customer service."


"YEP offers event planners a chance to build on existing talents, learn new skills and gain a lot more experience in event planning."

 "We are responsible only for creating and developing the app, the rest all will be managed by event planners."


"Email id:yepeedsgt@gmail.com"

 "Phone number: Divya - 9032993962 Goda - 9652266780 Sahaja - 9032159581 Tasneem - 9581199642"

"FAQ"


"1)What is YEP?"

 "YEP is a great platform where in users can meet, know and book event planners for their events. The user can either send SMS or call event planner from a list of event planners."


"2)Can an event planner register register in this app?"

 "Yes!"


"3)Can a user register in this app?"

 "No"


"4)What are the benefits for event planners registering in this app"

 "YEP offers event planners a chance to build on existing talents, learn new skills and gain a lot more experience in event planning."
At WHAT TIME IS THE EVENT?
